scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo 'PRE: Checking node_modules' && ls -la node_modules/@shopify/ || echo 'No @shopify yet'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo 'Fixing ALL Shopify packages...' && cd node_modules/@shopify && for package in shopify-api shopify-app-express shopify-app-session-storage shopify-app-session-storage-sqlite; do echo "Fixing $package..." && rm -rf $package && npm pack @shopify/$package && tar -xzf shopify-$package-*.tgz && mv package $package && rm shopify-$package-*.tgz; done && cd ../.. && echo 'Verifying all packages:' && ls -la node_modules/@shopify/*/
